import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css'; import './IndexPage.css'; const ScrollUpButton = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); // Show button when user scrolls down past 100px const toggleVisibility = () => { if (window.scrollY > 100) { setIsVisible(true); } else { setIsVisible(false); } }; // Scroll to the top of the page smoothly const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth', }); }; useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', toggleVisibility); // Cleanup event listener on component unmount return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', toggleVisibility); }, []); return (
{isVisible && ( )}
); }; const IndexPage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [menuActive, setMenuActive] = useState(false); // Toggle function for mobile menu const toggleMenu = () => { setMenuActive(!menuActive); }; const scrollToSection = (e, id) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default anchor link behavior const section = document.getElementById(id); if (section) { section.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); // Smooth scroll to the section } }; return (
  • scrollToSection(e, 'about')}>About Us
  • scrollToSection(e, 'features')}>Features
  • scrollToSection(e, 'benefits')}>Benefits
  • scrollToSection(e, 'use-cases')}>Use Cases
  • scrollToSection(e, 'testimonials')}>Testimonials

{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome to Ishuri Hub

Your one-stop solution for managing students' data and keeping parents updated

Learn More
{/* About Section */}

About Ishuri Hub

Ishuri Hub is a comprehensive platform designed to revolutionize the way schools manage their student's data and Establish Effective Communication and Collaboration with Parents. Our platform offers a user-friendly interface that allows administrators to efficiently handle student records, attendance, and academic performance. Teachers can easily track student progress, communicate with parents, and access educational resources. Parents are empowered with real-time updates on their child's academic journey, attendance, and school events, fostering a collaborative environment for student success. Ishuri Hub Ensures also Data Manipulation for Admins and Teachers by generating Reports and pinpointing Student's Data.

{/* Metric Cards */}

5,000+

Students Managed

1,200+

Parents Engaged

150+

Schools Using

95%

Parent Satisfaction

99.9%

System Uptime

Features

Student Management

Manage student data, track performance, and communicate with students and parents.

Parent Management

Keep track of parent information and maintain effective communication with them.

Notifications

Send notifications to students and parents about important updates and events.

Real-Time Analytics

Get real-time insights into student performance and school operations with our advanced analytics tools.

Event Management

Organize and manage school events, track attendance, and send reminders to parents and students.

Data Manipulation

Provides Reports and Data Manipulation features such as filtering and sorting to help administrators and teachers make data-driven decisions.

Student Management

Manage student data, track performance, and communicate with students and parents.

Parent Management

Keep track of parent information and maintain effective communication with them.

{/* Benefits Section */}

Benefits of Using Ishuri Hub

{/* Administrators' Benefits */}

For Administrators

  • Centralized data management
  • Real-time analytics and reporting
  • Improved communication with parents and teachers
  • Efficient event and attendance management
{/* Teachers' Benefits */}

For Teachers

  • Easy access to student data and performance metrics
  • Streamlined communication with parents
  • Tools for tracking and improving student progress
  • Automated notifications and reminders
{/* Parents' Benefits */}

For Parents

  • Receive real-time updates on students' progress
  • Stay informed about events and attendance
  • Direct communication with teachers and administrators
  • Get notifications on students achievements and areas of improvement
{/* Use Cases Section */}

Use Cases

{/* Use Case 1: Tracking Student Progress */}

Tracking Student Progress

With Ishuri Hub, teachers can easily track student progress and performance. Our dashboards provide detailed insights into each student's academic journey, helping teachers identify areas for improvement and provide targeted support.

{/* Use Case 2: Sending Notifications to Parents */}

Sending Notifications to Parents

Keep parents informed and engaged with automated notifications. Whether it's an upcoming event, a student's performance update, or an important announcement, Ishuri Hub ensures that parents receive timely and relevant information.

{/* Testimonials Section */}

What People Are Saying

{/* Testimonial 1 */}

"Ishuri Hub has transformed the way we manage our school data. It's user-friendly and efficient."

- School Administrator

{/* Testimonial 2 */}

"As a teacher, I can easily track student performance and communicate with parents. Highly recommend!"

- Teacher

{/* Testimonial 3 */}

"I love how I can stay updated with my child's progress and receive important notifications."

- Parent

{/* Contact Us Section */}

Contact Us

{/* Footer Section */}

Stay Connected with Us

  • Contact Us

© 2023 Ishuri Hub. All rights reserved.
